Description.Name: Punisher
Description.Details: Frank Castle was born on New Avalon to parents of Italian ancestry. Enlisted into the Federated Suns Marine Corp he excelled at every aspect of warfare and was soon trained to become a mechwarrior. After his long tour of duty during the 3rd Succession War he came home only to see his family gunned down for no apparent reason, having lost all meaning of life, he went on to hunt down every criminal he could find.
